message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal of money.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to go, and we both get a good amount.  No need to complicate things!
Bob, time is ticking and inflation is eating away at your potential gains. My offer is still generous. Take it while it's good!
Alice, I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to ensure I get a fair share. This offer is still better for you than a 50/50 split in the next round.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. You're losing money with every refusal. Meet me in the middle - this offer is more than fair!
Alice, we're both losing money here. Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come up a bit more, but we need to reach an agreement soon!
Bob, this is my final offer. You're running out of time and losing serious money. Take this deal and we both walk away with something substantial.
Alice, I understand you want a larger share, but I can't accept less than 400,000.  We're both losing money, and this offer is the best I can do. Let's not both walk away with nothing!
